title: Problems of Pakistanis living in Saudi Arabia be resolved on priority: Bilwal
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 8 (APP):Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari on Monday directed Ambassador-designate to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Ahmad Farooq that the problems of Pakistanis living in the KSA should be resolved on a priority basis.
Talking to Ambassador Ahmad Farooq, who called on him here, the minister said Pakistanis living all over the world, including those in Saudi Arabia, were the countryâ€™s assets.
He said Pakistan attached great importance to its relations with the brotherly country.
The foreign minister expressed best wishes for Ahmad Farooq for his new responsibilities.
